00023 class hbond_surface_t : public hbond_ideal_pt_base{
00024 public: 
00026   hbond_surface_t(const atom_vci hbond_atom, const atom_vci C_nbr_atom,
00027                   const atom_vci second_nbr_atom, 
00028                   BoundingVolume &site_vol, const int cap_number,
00029                   const bool include_metals = false,
00030                   const alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION)
00031     : hbond_ideal_pt_base(hbond_atom, C_nbr_atom, second_nbr_atom, site_vol,
00032                           cap_number, include_metals, a),
00033       A_surf(hbond_atom->pos, SURF_SPHERE_RAD)
00034   {
00035   }
00036 
00038   hbond_surface_t(const std::string& data_line, PDBBase& prot_atoms);
00039 
00040   hbond_surface_t(const hbond_surface_t& src)
00041     : hbond_ideal_pt_base(src)
00042   { do_copy(src); }
00043 
00044   const hbond_surface_t&
00045   operator=(const hbond_surface_t& src)
00046   {
00047     if(this != &src){
00048       do_copy(src);
00049       hbond_ideal_pt_base::operator= (src);
00050     }
00051     return *this;
00052   }
00053 
00054   virtual ~hbond_surface_t()
00055   { ; }
00056 
00057   bool
00058   closest_point(const my_float_t* pt, my_float_t* closest_pt, 
00059                 const my_float_t tol = 1.0);
00060 
00061   const my_float_t*
00062   ideal_dir() const
00063   { return A_cut_plane.normal(); }
00064 
00065   inline void
00066   transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00067   { std::cerr << "Unimplemented function in hbond_surface_t\n"; }
00068 
00069   inline void
00070   inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00071   { std::cerr << "Unimplemented function in hbond_surface_t\n"; }
00072 
00073   inline void
00074   revert()
00075   { std::cerr << "Unimplemented function in hbond_surface_t\n"; }
00076

00078 private:
00079   void 
00080   do_copy(const hbond_surface_t& src)
00081   {
00082     A_surf = src.A_surf;
00083     A_cut_plane = src.A_cut_plane;
00084     A_cap_plane_rad = src.A_cap_plane_rad;
00085     A_circles = std::vector<geometry::iCircle>(src.A_circles.begin(), 
00086                                                src.A_circles.end());
00087   }
00088 
00089   geometry::sphere_t A_surf;
00090   geometry::plane_t A_cut_plane;
00091   my_float_t A_cap_plane_rad; 
00092   std::vector<geometry::iCircle> A_circles;
00093   static const my_float_t SURF_SPHERE_RAD;  
00094 };

00096 typedef std::vector<hbond_surface_t>::iterator hbond_surf_vi;
00097 
00098 // Concentrate on the searching for now
00099 template<class surf_class>
00100 class HbondSurfaces : public HbondBase{
00101 public:
00102   typedef surf_class                                            value_type;
00103   typedef typename std::vector<surf_class>                      surfaces_vec;
00104   typedef typename std::vector<surf_class>::iterator            surfaces_vi;
00105   typedef typename std::vector<surf_class>::const_iterator      surfaces_vci;
00106 
00107   HbondSurfaces(const std::string fname, PDBBase& rad_atoms,
00108                 const verbose_level_t verbosity = VERBOSE_SILENT)
00109   {
00110     std::ifstream surf_caps_file;
00111     if(!open_ifstream(surf_caps_file, fname)) return;
00112 
00113     for(std::string line; std::getline(surf_caps_file, line); ){
00114       if(line.length() == 0 or line[0] == '#') continue;
00115 
00116       surf_class tmp_surf_cap(line, rad_atoms);
00117       A_surf_caps.push_back(tmp_surf_cap);
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   virtual ~HbondSurfaces()
00122   { ; }
00123 
00125   surfaces_vi
00126   surf_caps_begin()
00127   { return A_surf_caps.begin(); }
00128 
00130   surfaces_vi
00131   surf_caps_end()
00132   { return A_surf_caps.end(); }
00133 
00135   surfaces_vci
00136   surf_caps_begin() const 
00137   { return A_surf_caps.begin(); }
00138 
00140   surfaces_vci
00141   surf_caps_end() const
00142   { return A_surf_caps.end(); }
00143 
00144   inline void
00145   transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00146   {
00147     for(surfaces_vi V = A_surf_caps.begin(); V < A_surf_caps.end(); ++V)
00148       V->transform(R, T);
00149   }
00150 
00151   inline void
00152   inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00153   {
00154     for(surfaces_vi V = A_surf_caps.begin(); V < A_surf_caps.end(); ++V)
00155       V->inverse_transform(R, T);
00156   }
00157 
00158   inline void
00159   revert()
00160   {
00161     for(surfaces_vi V = A_surf_caps.begin(); V < A_surf_caps.end(); ++V)
00162       V->revert();
00163   }
00164   
00165 private:
00166   surfaces_vec A_surf_caps;  
00167   //static const std::string A_fname;
00168 };
00169 
00170 
00171 } // end namespace SimSite3D
